title: Set Up a Search Remarketing List (RLSA)
description: An SEM manager wants to create a remarketing list to bid more aggressively for users who have previously visited the website when they search on Google.

tasks.description: In Google Ads, create a new audience based on 'Website Visitors'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent starts the audience creation process.

tasks.description: Define the list to include all users who have visited in the last 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the correct membership duration.

tasks.description: Apply this audience to an existing search campaign with a '+25%' bid adjustment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the RLSA, which will increase bids for past visitors.
